items.title: Sudan paramilitary attacks leave key city without power
items.description: The drones also hit the civilian section of Port Sudan's airport, a fuel depot and a major hotel.

items.title: UK and India agree trade deal after three years of talks
items.description: The deal will improve access for UK whisky and cars to the Indian market, and cut taxes on India's clothing and footwear exports.

items.title: Germany's Merz wins vote for chancellor after surviving historic defeat
items.description: Conservative leader Friedrich Merz has won a parliament vote to become Germany's next chancellor at the second attempt.

items.title: Israel attacks main airport in Yemen's capital Sanaa
items.description: Three civilian planes, the departures hall, the runway and a military air base were hit, reports say.

items.title: Ukraine drone attack shut Moscow airports, says Russia
items.description: Moscow's annual Victory Day commemorations coincide this year with a three-day ceasefire in Ukraine, ordered by Putin.
